text: Freaks and Geeks is a 1999-2000 American comedy-drama television show on NBC. It is set at a high school in Detroit, Michigan in 1980. Freaks and Geeks has a cult following. The series appeared on Time magazine's 2007 "100 Greatest Shows of All Time" list. It also placed number 13 on the "Best 20 Shows of the Decade". == References == Category:1999 American television series debuts Category:2000 American television series endings Category:1990s American comedy television series Category:1990s American drama television series Category:1990s comedy-drama television series Category:1990s teen television series Category:2000s American comedy television series Category:2000s American drama television series Category:2000s comedy-drama television series Category:2000s teen television series Category:American comedy-drama television series Category:American teen comedy television series Category:American teen drama television series Category:Detroit Category:Michigan in fiction Category:NBC network series Category:Period television series Category:Works set in the 1980s Category:English-language television programs
